title: Amazing Mr. Callaghan (1955, Thriller) Anthony Wright, Lysiane Rey, Colette Ripert | French Film

sources.title: Amazing Mr. Callaghan (1955, Thriller) Anthony Wright, Lysiane Rey, Colette Ripert | French Film
sources.description:
Dangerous! Deadly!
A ship, La Circé, has sunk, and it might be criminal. The vessel belongs to Storata, who is asking the insurance company for one hundred million Francs. Callaghan works for them, and he investigates on dry land and at sea. The brilliant detective discovers that Storata has deliberately sunk his own ship to defraud the insurance company.

Colorized version: https://youtu.be/CbY1a7DVXj8


Original title: À toi de jouer... Callaghan!!! (1955) AKA: Amazing Mr. Callaghan / Beside Murder
This film is available in French and subtitled in many languages.

Director: Willy Rozier
Writers: Willy Rozier, Peter Cheyney
Cast: Antony Wright, Lysiane Rey, Raymond Cordy, Paul Cambo
Genres: Classics, French cinema, Crime, Drama, Thriller
